xsl:comment: Basic iCalendar feed template, with time zone information for Central Time with DST. If you're not in Central, replace with your own VTIMEZONE info. ** Remove this comment block, spacing is important **
ical: BEGIN:VCALENDAR VERSION:2.0 PRODID:-//SVCC//NONSGML Cascade Server//EN X-WR-CALNAME: X-WR-TIMEZONE:America/Chicago X-WR-CALDESC: BEGIN:VTIMEZONE LAST-MODIFIED:20111110T212531Z TZID:CST6CDT
